entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls along the Fundy coast early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm along the Fundy coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
